Body:
global fasta_file
geneseekr.export_fasta(metadata=blastx_method.metadata, analysistype=
    blastx_method.analysistype, reportpath=blastx_method.reportpath, cutoff
    =blastx_method.cutoff, program=blastx_method.program)
fasta_file = os.path.join(var.reportpath, '2018-SEQ-0552_geneseekr.fasta')
assert os.path.isfile(fasta_file)
header = open(fasta_file, 'r').readline().rstrip()
assert header == '>2018-SEQ-0552_OXA_12'
